content.rendered:
Portfolio

FamFam Family Shop

FamFam is a warm and friendly Romanian online shop website project designed to create a relaxed shopping experience for mother with children, grannies and couples.

The Challenges

With so much noise in the online environment, the website owner wanted to create an ecommerce website of a different taste, a website where the audience can feel good while shopping.

The website must have all the capabilities of a modern shop, with product pages, categories, filters on brands, sizes, prices, optimized for mobile and SEO, yet to feel comfy and welcoming for the visitors.

Project Goals:

  • Creating a professional online shop website with an interface easily to use even by a non-technical person
  • Designing the user experience on the website for all devices
  • Building all the necessary features for eCommerce and marketing
  • Integrating services for payment and delivery
  • Creating a blog section that supports community and provides updated information in a relaxed way
View Live Site

Family Friendly with Capital F

We created a digital solution built on WordPress with a frontend page builder that helps the eCommerce team easily create and manage products & content. Responsive, retina and SEO ready, our solution also delivers a beautiful shopping experience for the visitors from all devices.

The website has blocks and filters especially designed to display products in a delightful and enjoyable way. We combined the flexibility with all the powerful tools from WooCommerce. As a result, the flexibility and performance of the website are above expectations.

What we helped with

Web Design &
User Experience

Code &
Web Development

Development on WordPress

performance optimization

View Live Site

Let's transform your bright idea into a successful website

Did you find something interesting in the tagDiv Portfolio? Our creative team would love to hear from you. Drop us a line and let's build something great together!
